colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES YI DAM LHA BZHI'I GTOR CHOG DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LUNG RTOGS KYI YON TAN GYIS RGYUD BRGYAN PA'I DGE SLONG LHA'I BTZUN PA MI MDZED BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS GTZO BYAS PA'I, sh'A BLA MA BSOD NAMS NGAG DBANG DANG, ,LHA RIS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RNAMS KYIS @018B NGA CAG GI YI DAM SPYAN RAS GZIGS PHYAG BZHI PA, RJE BTZUN SGROL MA, RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED ZHAL GCIG PHYAG GNYIS PA, ,MGON PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA'I MNGON RTOGS SPYAN 'DREN BSKANG BSHAGS BZLOG BSKUL GTOR 'BUL BSTOD PA MNGA' GSOL DANG BCAS PA'I 'DON CHA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN CHER YANG DANG YANG DU BSKUL BA LA, LDOG MI NUS TE, NGA LTA BU LA 'DI LHA'I BSHAD RDZOM BYAS PA'I RGYU MA TSANG KYANG, ,BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS DNGOS SHUGS 'BYUNG BA RNAMS LA GZHIR BYAS TE, ,SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I KHU RAL GYI MKHAN PO NO MIN HAN ZHES 'BOD PA, ,@019A *, ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG 'DU SHES GSUM DANG LDAN PA GYI NA BA TSE DBANG RDO RJE GRAGS PAS SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI ZHI DAR PI LIG THU DKON MCHOG SKYABS KYIS SO, ,)
